Option.Name: PublishDir
Option.Description: Root directory to contain published builds and symbols

Option.Name: WithDDC
Option.Description: Build a standalone derived-data cache for the engine content and templates

Option.Name: AnalyticsTypeOverride
Option.Description: Identifier for analytic events to send
